subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Foster became a light-heavyweight champion in 1968 and went on to fight the legendary heavyweights Joe Frazier and Muhammad Ali, but he was knocked out by both.
snippet: Foster became a light-heavyweight champion in 1968 and went on to fight the legendary heavyweights Joe Frazier and Muhammad Ali, but he was knocked out by both.
